mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY B WHERE A.COMMUNITY_SEQ = B.COMMUNITY_SEQ ) CNT, A.COMMUNITY_SEQ, A.COMMON_SEQ, A.COMMUNITY_CATEGORY_SEQ, C.FILE_PATH, CASE WHEN LENGTH(A.COMMON_TITLE) > 15 THEN SUBSTR(A.COMMON_TITLE, 0, 15) ||'...' ELSE A.COMMON_TITLE END AS COMMON_TITLE, TO_CHAR(A.COMMON_CONTENT) COMMON_CONTENT, A.COMMON_HIT, A.COMMON_DEL_FLAG, A.IN_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IN_DATE, A.UP_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.UP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IN_DATE FROM COMMUNITY A LEFT JOIN ATTACH_FILE C ON (A.FILE_SEQ = C.FILE_SEQ) WHERE A.COMMON_SEQ = '6' AND A.COMMON_DEL_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY B WHERE A.COMMUNITY_SEQ = B.COMMUNITY_SEQ ) CNT, A.COMMUNITY_SEQ, A.COMMON_SEQ, A.COMMUNITY_CATEGORY_SEQ, A.FILE_SEQ, A.COMMON_TITLE, TO_CHAR(A.COMMON_CONTENT) COMMON_CONTENT, A.COMMON_HIT, A.COMMON_DEL_FLAG, A.IN_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IN_DATE, A.UP_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(A.UP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IN_DATE FROM COMMUNITY A WHERE A.COMMUNITY_SEQ = #{communitySeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMUNITY ( COMMUNITY_SEQ, COMMON_SEQ, FILE_SEQ, COMMON_TITLE, COMMON_CONTENT, COMMON_HIT, COMMON_DEL_FLAG, IN_USER_ID, IN_DATE, UP_USER_ID, UP_DATE ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(COMMUNITY_SEQ)),0) AS COMMUNITY_SEQ FROM COMMUNITY)+1, '6', #{tumnalil_img}, #{commonTitle}, #{commonContent}, '0', 'N', #{memberId}, SYSDATE, #{memberId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMUNITY SET COMMON_TITLE = #{commonTitle}, COMMON_CONTENT = #{commonContent}, UP_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE COMMUNITY_SEQ = #{communitySeq}
UPDATE COMMUNITY SET COMMON_DEL_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE COMMUNITY_SEQ = #{communitySeq}
UPDATE COMMUNITY SET COMMON_HIT = COMMON_HIT+1 WHERE COMMUNITY_SEQ = #{communitySeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply ( REPLY_SEQ, COMMUNITY_SEQ, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_DEL_FLAG, REPLY_PARENT_SEQ, REPLY_DEPTH, IN_USER_ID, IN_DATE, UP_USER_ID, UP_DATE ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(REPLY_SEQ)),0) AS REPLY_SEQ FROM REPLY)+1, #{communitySeq}, #{replyContent}, 'N', '0', '0', #{memberId}, SYSDATE, #{memberId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_SEQ, COMMUNITY_SEQ, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_DEL_FLAG, REPLY_PARENT_SEQ, REPLY_DEPTH, A.IN_USER_ID, B.FILE_SEQ, C.FILE_PATH, TO_CHAR(A.IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IN_DATE FROM REPLY A LEFT JOIN MEMBER B ON (A.IN_USER_ID = B.IN_USER_ID) LEFT JOIN ATTACH_FILE C ON(B.FILE_SEQ = C.FILE_SEQ) WHERE COMMUNITY_SEQ = #{communitySeq} AND REPLY_DEL_FLAG = 'N' AND REPLY_DEPTH = '0'
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY_DEL_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE REPLY_SEQ = #{replySeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY ( REPLY_SEQ, COMMUNITY_SEQ, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_DEL_FLAG, REPLY_PARENT_SEQ, REPLY_DEPTH, IN_USER_ID, IN_DATE, UP_USER_ID, UP_DATE ) VALUES ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(REPLY_SEQ)),0) AS REPLY_SEQ FROM REPLY)+1, #{communitySeq}, #{replyContent}, 'N', #{replySeq}, '1', #{memberId}, SYSDATE, #{memberId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT REPLY_SEQ, COMMUNITY_SEQ, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_DEL_FLAG, REPLY_PARENT_SEQ, REPLY_DEPTH, A.IN_USER_ID, B.FILE_SEQ, C.FILE_PATH, TO_CHAR(A.IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IN_DATE FROM REPLY A LEFT JOIN MEMBER B ON (A.IN_USER_ID = B.IN_USER_ID) LEFT JOIN ATTACH_FILE C ON(B.FILE_SEQ = C.FILE_SEQ) WHERE COMMUNITY_SEQ = #{communitySeq} AND REPLY_DEPTH = '1' AND REPLY_DEL_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT A.MEMBER_ID, B.FILE_PATH, A.MEMBER_PWD, A.MEMBER_NAME, A.MEMBER_NICKNAME, A.MEMBER_MOBILE, A.MEMBER_GENDER, A.MEMBER_HEIGHT, A.MEMBER_WEIGHT, A.MEMBER_EMAIL, A.MEMBER_GUBUN, A.MEMBER_ROUTE, A.IN_USER_ID, A.IN_DATE, A.UP_USER_ID, A.UP_DATE FROM member a, ( SELECT A.FILE_PATH FROM ATTACH_FILE A, member B WHERE A.FILE_SEQ = B.FILE_SEQ AND B.member_ID = #{memberId} ) b WHERE A.member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTACH_FILE ( FILE_SEQ, FILE_DETAIL_SEQ, FILE_REAL_NAME, FILE_SAVE_NAME, FILE_PATH, IN_USER_ID, IN_DATE, UP_USER_ID, UP_DATE ) values ( (SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(FILE_SEQ)),0) AS FILE_SEQ FROM ATTACH_FILE)+1, '1', #{fileRealName}, #{filesavename}, #{imgFile}, #{memberId}, SYSDATE, #{memberId}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(FILE_SEQ)),0) AS FILE_SEQ FROM ATTACH_FILE

SELECT T.RNUM, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY B WHERE T.COMMUNITY_SEQ = B.COMMUNITY_SEQ ) CNT, T.COMMUNITY_SEQ, C.FILE_PATH, CASE WHEN LENGTH(T.COMMON_TITLE) > 15 THEN SUBSTR(T.COMMON_TITLE, 0, 15) ||'...' ELSE T.COMMON_TITLE END AS COMMON_TITLE, T.COMMON_CONTENT, T.COMMON_HIT, T.IN_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(T.IN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') IN_DATE FROM
(SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(COMMON_HIT) DESC) RNUM, COMMUNITY_SEQ, FILE_SEQ, COMMON_TITLE, COMMON_CONTENT, COMMON_HIT, IN_USER_ID, IN_DATE FROM COMMUNITY WHERE COMMON_SEQ = '6' AND COMMON_DEL_FLAG = 'N' ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(COMMON_HIT) DESC) T LEFT JOIN ATTACH_FILE C ON (T.FILE_SEQ = C.FILE_SEQ) WHERE T.RNUM<=5

SELECT A.RN, A.COMMUNITY_SEQ, A.FILE_SEQ, CASE WHEN LENGTH(A.COMMON_TITLE) > 20 THEN SUBSTR(A.COMMON_TITLE, 0, 20) ||'...' ELSE A.COMMON_TITLE END AS COMMON_TITLE, B.FILE_PATH, A.IN_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, COMMUNITY_SEQ, FILE_SEQ, COMMON_TITLE, IN_DATE FROM ( SELECT COMMUNITY_SEQ, FILE_SEQ, COMMON_TITLE, IN_DATE FROM COMMUNITY WHERE COMMON_SEQ = 6 AND COMMON_DEL_FLAG = 'N' ORDER BY IN_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5 ) A LEFT JOIN ATTACH_FILE B ON (A.FILE_SEQ = B.FILE_SEQ) ORDER BY RN ASC

SELECT A.RN, A.COMMUNITY_SEQ, A.FILE_SEQ, CASE WHEN LENGTH(A.COMMON_TITLE) > 20 THEN SUBSTR(A.COMMON_TITLE, 0, 20) ||'...' ELSE A.COMMON_TITLE END AS COMMON_TITLE, B.FILE_PATH, A.IN_DATE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, COMMUNITY_SEQ, FILE_SEQ, COMMON_TITLE, IN_DATE FROM ( SELECT COMMUNITY_SEQ, FILE_SEQ, COMMON_TITLE, IN_DATE FROM COMMUNITY WHERE COMMON_SEQ = 6 AND COMMON_DEL_FLAG = 'N' ORDER BY IN_DATE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5 ) A LEFT JOIN ATTACH_FILE B ON (A.FILE_SEQ = B.FILE_SEQ) ORDER BY RN ASC
